description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. You are Phat Fly, the meanest fly in town. Customize yourself with hats, hair, and other accessories with money you find in-game. Upgrade your character with G.U.B.E.R. items such as booger bazookas, bombs, and sheilds.  Battle and avoid tons of different enemies such as bats, toads and even a giant monkey! This game was programmed by Brandon Hjelstrom (13).
description.short: You are Phat Fly, the meanest fly in town. Customize yourself with hats, hair, and other accessories with money you find in-game. Upgrade your character with G.U.B.E.R. items such as booger bazookas, bombs, and sheilds.  Battle and avoid tons of different enemies such as bats, toads and even a giant monkey! This game was programmed by Brandon Hjelstrom (13).
